scopingsheet_markdown:
```markdown
   # Scoping Sheet for EduTrack

   | Category       | Requirement            | Status                                                                                                                  |
   |---------------|-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
   | Application Overview | Application Name     | EduTrack                                                                                                                |
   | Application Overview | Production URL       | https://edutrack.com                                                                                                    |
   | Application Overview | Environment for Testing | ['Production']                                                                                                          |
   | Application Overview | Application Type     | ['Web', 'API']                                                                                                          |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Authentication Method  | ['Username & Password', 'SSO']                                                                                           |
   | Authentication & Access Control | User Roles            | ['Anonymous Users', 'Regular Users', 'Power Users', 'Administrators']                                                    |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Custom Roles         | 3                                                                                                                       |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Session Management   | ['JWT']                                                                                                                 |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Session Timeout Period| 25                                                                                                                      |
   | Input Processing | total_num_input_fields| 12                                                                                                                      |
   | Input Processing | Input Types Present   | ['Free text fields', 'File uploads (Types allowed: .pdf, .png)', 'Personal data', 'Database queries', 'API calls']      |
   | Data Processing  | Sensitive Data Handled| ['Personal Information', 'Intellectual Property']                                                                       |
   | Data Processing  | Data Storage          | ['Local Database', 'Cloud Storage']                                                                                     |
   | API Details     | Number of Endpoints    | 10                                                                                                                      |
   | API Details     | Authentication Required| Yes                                                                                                                     |
   | API Details     | Rate Limiting         | Yes                                                                                                                     |
   | API Details     | Documentation Available| Yes                                                                                                                     |
   | API Details     | API Methods           | ['GET', 'POST']                                                                                                         |
   | Infrastructure  | Security Controls Present | ['WAF', 'IPS/IDS', 'Load Balancer', 'Anti-DDoS']                                                                        |
   | Infrastructure  | Hosting               | ['Cloud']                                                                                                               |
   | Business Logic  | Critical Functions    | ['User Data Management', 'Administrative Operations', 'System Configuration']                                           |
   | Security Requirements | Compliance Requirements| ['GDPR', 'ISO 27001']                                                                                                   |
   | Security Requirements | Previous Testing      | 15/01/2024                                                                                                              |
   | Security Requirements | Known Vulnerabilities  | Minor XSS issue in user profiles                                                                                        |
   | Security Requirements | Critical Assets       | Student Records, Course Materials                                                                                       |
   | Testing Constraints| Time Restrictions     | ['During Business Hours only']                                                                                          |
   | Testing Constraints| Testing Limitations   | ['No Automated Scanning']                                                                                               |
   | Deliverables      | Required Reports      | ['Executive Summary', 'Technical Details', 'Remediation Plan', 'Risk Rating']                                           |
   | Notes             | Additional Information| The platform enforces two-factor authentication for admin roles. Data encryption is implemented at rest and in transit. |
   | Client Contact Information| Client Email          | michael.lee@outlook.com                                                                                                 |
   | Client Contact Information| Client Company        | Edu Secure                                                                                                              |
   | Client Contact Information| Client Name          | Michael Lee                                                                                                             |
   ```

requirement_df.status: Minor XSS issue in user profiles
The platform enforces two-factor authentication for admin roles. Data encryption is implemented at rest and in transit.
